name: Bunker Buster (MysteriousDeveloper)
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 98 - Theme: Empty, Limitation: Make it a Roguelike

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Welcome to Bunker Buster!

You are a survivor of the Nuclear Wasteland. A shady group called "The Fulcrum", whose meddling in Wasteland affairs caused suffering, was said to be a myth... Until now. 

Go down into the Fulcrum's bunker! Go as deep as you can! Slaughter every Grunt and Guard you come across! And level yourself up to become more E.P.I.C!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move around

SPACE - Pause game

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Enjoy!

If you enjoyed the game, consider supporting me on Patreon.

If you want to play a similar-styled game, check out Zombie Click.

Credits:
